title.narrative: Policy support to State Governments and civil society

description.narrative: This activity (Policy support to State Governments and civil society) is a component of Regional Initiative Fund 2 (RIF 2) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £1,830,784. This component benefits Nigeria, and works in the following sector(s): Decentralisation and support to subnational government, Democratic participation and civil society. , with the following implementing partners: Nike Foundation. The start date is 17-01-2014 and the end date is 30-07-2017.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Decentralisation and support to subnational government
